posts.message:
السلام عليكم

شباب انا ببنى مشروع تخرج Enterprise web application
و  واحد من اهم المبادئ انى استخدم الفرى تكنولوجى زى الجافا 
بس مش عارف استخدم اى داتابيز فى المشروع و تكون قوية و تناسب الحجم المستهدف
اتمنى اشوف مقترحاتكم و آرائكم و نتناقش سوا و نوصل لافضل حل ان شاء الله :)
anyone used Google Closure? https://developers.google.com/closure/ any guides on start learning it please?

posts.message:
Nice read, I struggle to make sure I don't commit that fallacy myself :)

Have a look, put yourself in the customer's shoes, not the writer's, think how to avoid actually doing things similarly.

posts.description: A customer reported a problem with theSystem­Time­To­Tz­Specific­Local­Timefunction. (Gosh, why couldn't they have reported a problem with a function with a shorter name! Now I have to type that thing over and over again.)

posts.caption: www.daedtech.com
posts.description: Here, “tokens” will be an array of strings containing “Erik” and “Dietrich”. It’s not exactly Earth Shattering to tokenize a string in this fashion and some incarnation or another of this predates .NET, C# and probably even my time on this planet.
